name: evolution-api
title: Evolution API
description: This extension lets you interact with evolution API and helps you in WhatApp automation
author: haider_patan

commands.name: settings
commands.title: Settings & Status
commands.subtitle: View configuration and status
commands.description: Check Evolution API settings and connection status

commands.name: create-instance
commands.title: Create Instance
commands.subtitle: Create a new WhatsApp instance
commands.description: Create a new Evolution API WhatsApp instance

commands.name: manage-instances
commands.title: Manage Instances
commands.subtitle: View and manage instances
commands.description: List, connect, restart, logout, and delete instances

commands.name: send-message
commands.title: Send Message
commands.subtitle: Send a text message
commands.description: Send a single WhatsApp text message

commands.name: send-bulk-message
commands.title: Send Bulk Messages
commands.subtitle: Send messages to multiple recipients
commands.description: Send text messages to multiple numbers with report

commands.name: send-media
commands.title: Send Media
commands.subtitle: Send media files
commands.description: Send image, video, audio, or document files

commands.name: send-sticker
commands.title: Send Sticker
commands.subtitle: Send a sticker
commands.description: Send a sticker via URL or base64

commands.name: send-location
commands.title: Send Location
commands.subtitle: Share a location
commands.description: Send location coordinates with name and address

commands.name: send-reaction
commands.title: Send Reaction
commands.subtitle: React to a message
commands.description: Send emoji reaction to a message

commands.name: send-poll
commands.title: Send Poll
commands.subtitle: Create a poll
commands.description: Send an interactive poll with options

commands.name: send-list
commands.title: Send Interactive List
commands.subtitle: Send a list message
commands.description: Send an interactive list with sections and rows

commands.name: check-whatsapp-numbers
commands.title: Check WhatsApp Numbers
commands.subtitle: Verify numbers
commands.description: Check if numbers are registered on WhatsApp

commands.name: set-presence
commands.title: Set Presence
commands.subtitle: Set online status
commands.description: Set instance presence to available or unavailable

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: Set AUTHENTICATION_API_KEY you used to start Evolution API

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
